technologies.name: Biotechnology (focused on molecules and cells)
technologies.evidence: Avidicure is pioneering an entirely new dual agonistic, multifunctional and avidity engineered antibody modality, 'AVC-Boosters', designed to safely deliver targeted and potent monotherapy, with broad applicability in oncology.

technologies.name: Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Data
technologies.evidence: The platform was designed combining decades of antibody engineering know-how, in silico design capabilities and immunology expertise.
